name: Unealia
description:
Unealia is a 2-4 players local-multiplayer party game. Compete to destroy friendships in the collections of minigames.

Maybe We will upload a new version with new games.

We have been five colleagues who have worked on this project: Victor Dominguez, Jorge Mateo Ortiz, Pere Balasch, Enric Palà and me, Ignacio Solera.
